This is like the fanciest food court ever.  A very cool space filled with all types of fooderies and bars specializing in everything from sushi to paella to sandwiches to egg dishes to booze.  I accompanied a friend while she got some eggs with ham and mushrooms over fried potatoes that she was mad for.  Still full from my snacking at the Mercat de la Boqueria, I settled for a delicious but extremely expensive sangria.Looked like there might be a couple of vegan options in the way of tapas (like padron peppers), possibly some veggie paella, or gazpacho.  Be sure to wind your way through all the options before you decide! And totally mix and match from the different stands!
